dialogue: This is the portal that leads into a brand new adventure.
Beyond this gateway, many new journeys and fresh experiences await your arrival!
Before you depart for your adventure, there are some questions you must answer first.
Be truthful when you answer them!
Now then... let the questions begin!
That's all the questions for now.
You have no reason to be.
If you aren't happy with your outcome, take solace in knowing you can always try again.
